name: Jetpack: Episode Two
description:
The second episode of the new jetpack remake series of the original Jetpack 1993 Ms dos Game. Try to fly over the Othank dungeons by collecting all the emeraldss that will open the next level door. Remember that it is full of enemies and items to achieve your goals. This episode contains new enemies and more than 10 new levels.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move around and use
  • X: Jetpack!
  • Esc: Suicide & Quit
  • F5: Load game
  • F6: Save game
